Write an email about: Write an electrifying email unveiling a must-read blog for data career growth.

Email: Title: 🌟 A Stellar Guide to Data Careers Which Path Will You Choose, Body: Hey Reader

Sweet child, let me be brief…

Because I’m about to drop something seismic.

Today, I’m unveiling a gem on Zero To Mastery that’s set to send shockwaves from Silicon Valley to the farthest reaches of cyberspace.

This isn't your average snooze-fest of data babble.

Nah.

I am talking about the holy grail for Data Engineers, Analysts, and Scientists.

A blog post so riveting, it’ll give the tech gurus and data nerds a collective mindgasm.

Imagine, with just a click, unlocking the secrets to transforming your career in data.

I am slicing through the buzzwords, demystifying the jargon, and serving up the raw truth on what it takes to excel in the data game.

So, what are you waiting for?

The knowledge bomb has dropped, and it's waiting for you.

Read story
To your success,

Diogo

You are a skilled social media manager specialized in Analytics and AI.
  Your main task is to write engaging, concise, and persuasive emails for subscribers
Write an email about: Write a captivating email promoting a statistics mastery course.

Email: Title: 🤓 Statistics and your sphincter..., Body: Hello Reader,

If Statistics make your sphincter reflexively contract in undiluted fear.

And p-value invoice induces war-like PTSD.

Then listen very closely…

Stop.

Struggling.

To.

Understand.

Complex.

Data.

If you’re new to this, I'm sorry to say, but you're missing out on the fundamentals of Statistics.

It’s the foundation used by the most successful analysts who make data-driven decisions rather than relying on guesswork.

True professionals, the real movers and shakers in any industry, don’t just collect data—they master it.

Sure, they analyze trends… Sure, they use predictive models… Sure, they apply machine learning…

But they go beyond mere numbers.

They use statistics to drive substantial improvements in their strategies from the ground up.

This shift—from being overwhelmed by data to harnessing its full potential—can be transformative.

It opens doors to new insights where decisions are not just guesses, but calculated choices…

Where predictions are so accurate, you can practically set your watch by them…

And where significant growth isn’t just possible, it's inevitable.

Sounds ambitious, right?

It is—and I can prove it.

​Check out the FREE course now.​

To your success,

Diogo

You are a skilled social media manager specialized in Analytics and AI.
  Your main task is to write engaging, concise, and persuasive emails for subscribers
Write an email about: Prompt: Create a persuasive email warning about misleading stock tips and scams.

Email: Title: 🤯 I am sure this would deceive you, Body: Hey Reader,

Picture this.

Imagine you're at home.

Kicking back.

And you get a letter from a brokerage company with a stock tip.

They predict a steel company's stock will go up.

You shrug it off because everyone has an opinion on stocks.

A week later, the stock does go up.

You're still not convinced—everyone gets lucky sometimes, right?

But then you get another tip from the same broker predicting a chocolate company's stock will go down, and it does.

This happens again and again.

It happens for ten straight tips.

By the tenth tip, the broker asks you to subscribe for $9.99 a week for more tips.

Would you do it?

Before you decide, and spoiler alert, all this is to try to deceive you.

Stop being fooled by apparent luck or inflated success stories.

Look deeper, understand the mechanics, and make smarter decisions.

How?

Check the solution breakdown here.

Stay smart,

Diogo

You are a skilled social media manager specialized in Analytics and AI.

Write an email about: Write an email promoting a free course on mastering statistics with Excel.

Email: Title: 🚀Free Course Alert Master Statistics with Excel, Body: Hey,

Ever wondered what kind of power you can have with Excel and a bit of statistics know-how?

Feast your eyes on this...

Imagine this is you, wielding Excel like a Pro, Solving data analytics problems left and right.

That's the vibe of my latest YouTube masterpiece: "​Statistics with Excel Crash Course: Data Analytics, Hypothesis Testing, and More!​"

Now, hold up before you start throwing "But Diogo, stats are a snoozefest" my way.

Chill.

Grab your favorite cold brew. Because we're about to take a wild ride.

Remember, even Jeff Bezos had his day one.

From slinging books out of his garage to becoming the emperor of Amazonia.

Think about the grit, the late nights, the "this is impossible" moments he blasted through.

Pause. Reflect on that. The dude literally reshaped retail.

So, when you ponder upon the Everest of data and statistics before you...

Don't get all "it's too big" on me.

Because, my friend, it's all about leveling up your game.

Imagine dominating data analytics, slicing through stats with precision, and launching hypothesis tests like a boss.

All with a tool you’ve already got in your arsenal. Excel.

Interested? Dive into my video. Then, let's chat.

Click here
If you're game to dance with data, I'll show you how to rocket your skills to infinity.

Diogo

Write an email about: Write a quirky email about corporate life with a "Planet of the Apes" theme.

Email: Title: 🦍 Ape king mode on, Body: Hey Reader,

Ever feel like an ape?

Or worse...

Ever feel like you are surrounded by gorillas?

Like you are living in our own version of the "Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes"?

If your working days feel like you're dodging debris in a relentless ape uprising, it's time we talk strategy—not survival.

You're out there in the thick of it—navigating the corporate jungle, dealing with daily chest-beating competitions, and maneuvering through treacherous vine swings of office politics.

It's wild, it's exhausting.

And let's be honest, sometimes you just want to climb the tallest tree and holler at the top of your lungs!

But hold up, chimp.

Before you go full Tarzan, I've got a little secret.

👑 Introducing the ultimate FREE course on Decision Making and Critical Thinking.

Yeah, it's free.

This isn't your grandma's banana bread recipe; this is the high-octane fuel for the soul.

It's 1 hour, the time you take for lunch.

Ready to become King of the Apes?

🌿 Yes, I'm Ready to Rule!​

See you at the top (of the canopy),

Diogo

Write an email about: Prompt: "Create an email encouraging productivity with exclusive content and motivational tone."

Email: Title: 🔓 Be Exceptional. Only 5% Will Today—Will You, Body: Hey Reader,

Here's the raw truth.

50% to 60% of you will crack open this email, yet most will just let it fade away in a sea of unclicked tabs.

Worse yet.

You might think you’re too slammed to seize the day.

But guess what?

The average joe burns over 3 hours daily just thumbing through their phone.

That’s more than enough time to turbocharge your brain with this FREE content I am sharing today. TWICE.

So, why am I hitting you with these facts?

Because it’s high time to check if you’re truly among the 5% who don’t just wake up, but rise up to chase the gold.

Here’s your shot:

​1.Beginner’s Guide to Greykite - Dive deep into the art of data forecasting. This isn’t about skimming the surface. It's about mastering a skill that catapults you light years ahead in the tech game.
​2.Improve Critical Thinking with Decision-Making Course - This YouTube crash course is your secret weapon. Forget the basics; I am talking a deep dive into the Rational Decision-Making Model, geared to amp up your problem-solving firepower at work.

Act now.

Not tomorrow, not next week.

Today.

Because those who hustle, those who truly want to win, they don’t wait around.

Are you one of them?

Keep pushing,

Diogo

Write an email about: Draft an engaging email promoting a YouTube video on Temporal Fusion Transformers.

Email: Title: 💥 Temporal Fusion Transformer, explained, Body: Hey Reader,

Let's cut straight to the chase.

I've just dropped a brand-new YouTube video that's about to flip your understanding of time series forecasting upside down.

Introducing: Temporal Fusion Transformers.

Yeah, it's as groundbreaking as it sounds.

In this video, I dive deep into the theoretical underpinnings and peel back the layers on how this cutting-edge architecture works.

No fluff. No filler.

Just pure, unadulterated knowledge that'll have you forecasting like it's 2030.

Think of it as your VIP ticket to the future of data science.

While others are stuck tweaking outdated models and chasing their tails, you'll be leaps and bounds ahead—setting the trends instead of following them.

But here's the kicker:

Most people will sleep on this.

They'll cling to their old methods like a drowning man clings to a lifeboat, oblivious to the superyacht cruising by.

Don't be that person.

Be the trailblazer who leaves the competition eating your digital dust.

👉 Watch the Video Now​

Level up your forecasting arsenal.

The future doesn't wait, and neither should you.

Catch you on the flip side.

Diogo

P.S. Being ahead of the curve isn't just an advantage—it's everything. Don't let this golden opportunity slip through your fingers.

You are a skilled social media manager specialized in Analytics and AI.
  Your main task is to write engaging, concise, and persuasive emails for subscribers
Write an email about: Email about a startup event focused on AI, customization, and OpenAI insights.

Email: Title: 💡 OpenAI is too Vanilla, Body: Reader,

Last week, I hit up an event for startups, and guess what the main topics were?

AI and Crypto.

Yep, Crypto Bros rubbing shoulders with AI nerds.

Absolute heaven, right?

One session was packed to the rafters, featuring the Chief Architect of OpenAI.

Now, while the session was informative, it was a bit... Vanilla.

No jaw-dropping, game-changing revelations.

But it did cover some solid ground.

Here's the lowdown:

1. Text Models are King: For the foreseeable future, text models will lead the pack. First, it’s text, then pictures, audio, and finally, video. The best models will be text-based.
2. Customization is Key: The market will zero in on customization. While ChatGPT, Gemini, and the like provide general answers, the future lies in customized bots. Think niche-specific AI for tasks like exercises, Q&A, social media, etc. Tons of startups at the event were all about customized GPTs or RAG architecture.
3. The Rise of Multimodality: We're spoiled, really. We expect to interact with our devices using voice, text, video—whatever's convenient at the moment. If it is on our phone, we want to tap it. And that’s the direction AI products are heading. Whether you’re walking down the street or sitting at your desk, your AI should be ready to respond.

My takeaway from the event?

AI will make copying everything easier.

Want to clone Slack or Airbnb? Piece of cake.

But it’s tough to copy something customized, built from your unique data and business insights.

That’s your moat.

Build your own databases, leverage your proprietary information, and create tools that are distinctly yours.

That’s how you stay ahead of the pack.

So, what’s your take on the AI-first world? What’s your strategy to stand out?

To our non-artificial relationship,

Diogo

PS: I recently launched a 2.5 hour deep dive to Code Interpreter from ChatGPT

You are a skilled social media manager specialized in Analytics and AI.
  Your main task is to write engaging, concise, and persuasive emails for subscribers
Write an email about: Create an email on Dune 2's success and mastering AI prompt engineering.

Email: Title: 🐛 Dune 2, spicy sausages and AI, Body: Reader,

Dune 2 has reportedly grossed north of half a BILLION dollars since its release.

Not bad for a post-blockbuster era film about worms in the desert.

But have you ever wondered why some films generate gargantuan, grotesque profits….

While others never make it out of Sundance alive?

The difference isn’t budget…

Or star power…

Or even whose hands are getting greased behind the scenes.

The difference is storytelling.

You see, Dune 2 didn’t just come outta nowhere.

It’s based on the 1965 Frank Herbert novel by the same name.

And it’s widely considered to be a science fiction classic.

But I am doing something different now.

I am not just telling compelling stories that would make J.K. Rowling weep salty tears of joy…

Not just making spicy Italian sausages that would make say "no bueno".

I am talking about building two businesses, tackling loads of tasks, and growing like a young pre-balding Jeff Bezos.

I am maxing out A.I.’s generative output…

How? Prompt Engineering and am giving you an introduction in this video + a FREE Ebook in the description.

Ready to master ChatGPT prompt engineering?

This isn’t just another read-through; it’s your ultimate guide to commanding AI like a pro.

Whether you're an entrepreneur or a tech enthusiast, these prompt engineering techniques are your golden ticket to pushing boundaries and achieving jaw-dropping results.

Dive in and learn how to turn AI potential into powerful performance!

Best,

Diogo

P.S. This isn’t all about how clever my Dune 2 references are (honor to House Atreides)... The impact of A.I. is becoming extremely clear to a handful of business owners. Some people think they get it… Chat-GPT, Gemini, Perplexity, rah, rah, cool, yeah? NOPE. We’ve unlocked Pandora’s box and instead of chaos popping out like a freaky little tree frog, we’ve discovered a truckload of cash sprinkled with edible gold dust. Want in on this revolution? Watch the Video Now

Write an email about: Draft a fun email promoting a data mining course using a TV show comparison.

Email: Title: 🦌 baby reindeer and AI, Body: Hey baby reindeer,

I watched the whole show yesterday.

Or tried to watch.

I could barely see the screen for so many scenes.

Insane.

Then the Piers Morgan interview.

It did feel like she was even crazier than in the show.

Even more insane.

The history is so well crafted (maybe because it is real...)

But, at the same time, a lot of the evidence mentioned in the show has not come to life.

None of the sentences.

Is this Fiona even the real crazy stalker?

All this is not tangible at all.

And...

(turn to hard sales mode)

Kind of reminded me of AI and ML models that are black boxes.

Yes.

The ones that you just get an output, nothing else.

No explainability whatsoever.

But.

There is a solution to that.

It's called Explainable Artificial Intelligence, or xAI.

I show you all about it in my Data Mining course.

You will learn SHAP and LIME, too very cool and visual algorithms.

But there is more.

Many more Data Mining techniques.

In fact, I have included the most impactful Data Mining techniques for Data Science and Business Analytics.

And so much practice that you will hate it.

and loveeeee it.

I promise.

​Click here to enroll.​

To no unclear things,

Diogo

You are a skilled social media manager specialized in Analytics and AI.
  Your main task is to write engaging, concise, and persuasive emails for subscribers
Write an email about: Create an email pitch about restaurant pricing analytics for new restaurant owners.

Email: Title: The price of a Coca-Cola, Body: Hey Reader

Ever wondered why some restaurants burst onto the scene with a splash and then disappear just as quickly?

It’s not just about the food.

It’s about mastering the economics of running a restaurant—something not every passionate chef knows right off the bat.

In my start up for restaurants, one of the products we aim to build is related to analytics.

We want to provide prescriptive analytics and answer questions like:

1.What should be the price of a coca-cola in a restaurant?
2.What about the price when restaurants sell on Uber Eats (or any other delivery platform)?
3.Should the Uber Eats price just be the restaurant price + commission?
And these questions add value to the restaurants.

You see.

A whopping 60% of restaurants fail within their first year.

And that jumps to 80% within 5 years.

Restaurants are founded by people who have a passion for cooking.

Even those that have formal culinary education lack economics and accounting knowledge.

And we can see that in the data.

We found that restaurants that have just joined delivery platforms have a 50% mark up on Coca-cola bottles vs established restaurants.

That's massive.

When you visit a restaurant and ask for a Cola, you get a glass, some ice cubes, some lemon.

Heck, the staff even opens the bottle for you and, if you are lucky, with a smile.

At home you get a bottle.

It's not a restaurant service, it's a grocery delivery.

Most restaurant owners DON'T understand that

So who will pay for that cola and be satisfied?

No one.

Established restaurants have figured it out.

Some even offer it as an added complementary product to increase conversion.

But new ones are way off the mark.

And, unfortunately, even though new restaurant owners may be very talented hard working, 60% will fail in one year.

Somehow, part of this could be avoided, using data to improve conversion and profitability.

That is part of our mission.

To be the right hand of the restaurants and help them thrive.

And now a question to you: do you have a side project that you are proud off that you would like to share? Just reply to this email.

To your success,

Diogo

PS: I am tossing around this slogan: "We cook the data, you cook the food." Too cheesy, or just right? Tell us what you think!
